title: Replace book cover photos with 4 newly uploaded book covers

requirements.summary: Store the 4 newly uploaded book cover photos as static assets with standardized filenames
acceptanceCriteria: book-cover-01.jpeg in frontend/public/assets/generated/ shows the 'गंगा की वाणी' cover (Ganga goddess imagery)
book-cover-02.jpeg in frontend/public/assets/generated/ shows the 'मन के मोती' cover (maroon/yellow with Krishna)
book-cover-03.jpeg in frontend/public/assets/generated/ shows the 'श्री कृष्ण दर्शन' cover (Krishna with cosmic form)

requirements.summary: Update the 'Books by Our Founder' section on Home page to display 4 book cards with new cover images
acceptanceCriteria: The 'Books by Our Founder' section on the Home page shows exactly 4 book cards
Each card displays the correct new cover image from /assets/generated/
Book titles 'गंगा की वाणी', 'मन के मोती', 'श्री कृष्ण दर्शन', and 'वृद्धाश्रम' are displayed beneath each respective cover
The layout is responsive (grid or horizontal scroll) and consistent with the existing warm earthy design theme
